title: Course records, record numbers, and unlimited inspiration: Paracyclists leave their mark at the Leadville Trail 100 and SBT GRVL
content:
Meg Fisher and Steven Wilke set new course records on the notoriously difficult courses while dozens of other paracyclists participate in inclusive categories.

Read the full article at Course records, record numbers, and unlimited inspiration: Paracyclists leave their mark at the Leadville Trail 100 and SBT GRVL on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
